entries.author: mohammad_anwar
entries.text: Welcome to a new week with a couple of fun tasks "Odd Sum" and "Last Element". If you are new to the weekly challenge then why not join us and have fun every week. For more information, please read the FAQ.
entries.title: The Weekly Challenge - 306

entries.author: mohammad_anwar
entries.text: Enjoy a quick recap of last week's contributions by Team PWC dealing with the "Binary Prefix" and "Alien Dictionary" tasks in Perl and Raku. You will find plenty of solutions to keep you busy.
entries.title: RECAP - The Weekly Challenge - 305

entries.author: ali
entries.text: Noticed the introduction of Data::Show, one more gem from CPAN. Do checkout the compact solutions. Well done.
entries.title: TWC305

entries.author: arne_sommer
entries.text: Raku once again showing off the powerful features. Get the documentation of each used in the solution. Keep it up great work.
entries.title: Prefixed Alien

entries.author: dave_jacoby
entries.text: Another week another HTTP status code based story as well as plenty of fun code. Keep it up great work.
entries.title: Use Proxy

entries.author: jaldhar_vyas
entries.text: Raku never miss the opportunity to surprise me, this week too plenty of new features shared. Highly recommended.
entries.title: Perl Weekly Challenge: Week 305

entries.author: jorg_sommrey
entries.text: Use of CPAN makes the solution compact and easy to follow. Keep promoting the use of CPAN.
entries.title: Alien Primes

entries.author: luca_ferrari
entries.text: Back to loads of contributions including guest, enough to keep you busy. You really don't want to skip it.
entries.title: Sorting and Nested Loops

entries.author: luis_mochan
entries.text: Master of one-liners in Perl and on top using CPAN. Great work.
entries.title: Perl Weekly Challenge 305

entries.author: peter_campbell_smith
entries.text: You are given 2 different approaches with plenty of documentation. Don't forget to play with the solutions.
entries.title: Binary aliens

entries.author: robbie_hatley
entries.text: Nice detailed implementation of prime number, worth checking. Thanks for sharing knowledge with us.
entries.title: The Weekly Challenge #305

entries.author: roger_bell_west
entries.text: I really enjoyed this as we have varieties of solutions. Highly recommended.
entries.title: Binary Aliens

chapters.header: The Weekly Challenge by Mohammad Sajid Anwar will help you step out of your comfort-zone. You can even win prize money of $50 by participating in the weekly challenge. We pick one champion at the end of the month from among all of the contributors during the month, thanks to the sponsor Lance Wicks.
chapters.title: The Weekly Challenge

header: It seems something is moving in the Perl world. D Ruth Holloway became the Community Engagement Chair, Dave Cross started to build a web site for the Proposed Perl Changes, and there are going to be changes.
On the other hand one of the long-time Perl enthusiasts sent me an angry unsubscribe email telling me how some people (this time it was not me) are ruining Perl.
At the bottom of the newsletter and also on our Perl events page you can find out about all the Perl-related events we know about. If yours isn't listed there, it is just a Pull-Request to add it.
subject: Something is moving
